author: Naushad K. Cherrayil
title: Free and unlimited VoIP calling for two months for Etisalat subscribers in UAE
description: Telecom operator may offer its Home eLife version for free for a limited period soon
content:
UAE telecom operator Etisalat is offering free voice and video calls over the internet (VoIP) for two months to its residents.
In a message sent to subscribers, it said: To stay in touch with your loved ones during these challenging times, subscribe to the M… [+525 chars]
